Plants get water through the roots because of;(a) Capillarity;(b) Viscosity;(c) Gravity;(d) Elasticity;(a) Capillarity

It happens;(a) Because viscosity of eater is high;(b) Because of the capillary action of cotton threads;(c) Because of gravitational force;(d) Because of evaporation of water.;(b) Because of the capillary action of cotton threads
